document.bingtitle: Chopped – Restaurant Concept Profile – QSR Magazine
document.webtitle: Chopped Restaurant Concept Profile QSR Magazine
document.description: The flagship restaurant pulls in a large university ... Katz is especially proud of his bowls and napkins ... I’m not going to get back there and chop salads ...
